price: 60. The leaders of his people said: "Verily, we see you in plain error."
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmihi innā lanarāka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
